item.title: Quick: Useless Classes
item.description: Here is a quick reminder. When you have a class/object that only has a single method. 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 my $obj = Class->new( arg1 => "whatever", arg2 => 10, ); my $result = $obj->one_method( arg3 => [], arg4 => {}, ); then just make a single function out of it. 1 2 3 4 5 6 my $result = one_method( arg1 => "whatever", arg2 => 10, arg3 => [], arg4 => {}, ); this also works with multiple methods, but with just a single method it defenitely should just be a single function.
